pullRequest.title: Convert illegal characters into legal ones.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Attempt to fix issue #1164 .
Source of error:
The JacksonParser does not accept unquoted control chars (ASCII characters with value less than 32) unless udpate it's features.
Parsing unquoted chontrol chars will cause an  Illegal Unquoted character exception.
Tests:

Implement new test cases to ensure parser works as expected.
Using the attached test json file, illegal character (the tab) is converted into legal ones as shown in the preview.



testJson file:
testJson.txt

nodes.bodyText: I don't see anything that tests for the value "\tvalue" which what the original bug was about.

afterCommit.message: Test tab in key & value string

commit.message: Convert illegal characters into leagal ones.

Test tab in key & value string

Also fix up test that depended on previous TAB
related error message and clean up logging
